data.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: So many books, so little time.
data.author: Frank Zappa

data.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
data.author: Robert Frost

data.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Life is never fair, and perhaps it is a good thing for most of us that it is not.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
data.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

data.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
data.author: Stephen Covey

data.quote: Life isn't about getting and having, it's about giving and being.
data.author: Kevin Kruse

data.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
data.author: Babe Ruth

data.quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
data.author: Vince Lombardi

data.quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
data.author: Charles Swindoll

data.quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
data.author: John Lennon

data.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
data.author: Napoleon Hill
